file_content.text: If my sense of direction's right, Team Outlander is thataway.
Commander, I am pleased you live.
If our new friend is eavesdropping through that thing, you're giving away our location.
ARIES may be listening to us.
I have secured and encrypted this node. Our conversation will remain private.
I can't walk ten meters without seeing your face. Can't you take a hint?
Ugh, you again...
Not while I have critical data to share with you.
You won't always feel that way, I promise.
I still plan to kill you.
You misplace your hatred. I come to you only as an ally.
I have escaped from ARIES to help you. Unfortunately, Vaylin has also broken free--and she found her missing starships.
It's hopeless. We'll die before we get to our ships.
No one dies without my permission.
Empress Vaylin, you're alive!
Are you sad lot all that's left of my forces?
We suffered heavy losses. There are more survivors hiding nearby.
Call them here. I'm taking back my fleet.
We will be destroyed! I was on Voss. I heard my sisters die. I... I am afraid, Empress.
Vaylin presents an opportunity. If she distracts ARIES, we have a chance to stop him.
And after he's been dealt with? What's next for you?
Tell me what's in it for you.
This is my home. I intend to stay, but I will not prevent you from leaving.
In other words, you want to team up and destroy him. Same old SCORPIO. We're all just pawns in your game, right?
You must think I'm an idiot.
Do not hate me because I thought of it first. I simply process data more quickly.
There is no "we." You betrayed me. I'll bury you in the same grave with ARIES and Vaylin.
I want you all dead.
I am confident you will recognize the benefits of our partnership, eventually.
Commander, do you read? I detect a power surge at your location...
Aw, come on!
As I was saying, I'm taking back my fleet. Join me. The controls can't be far.
